attributes.action: do more about homophobia in British Secondary Schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "I found a horrifying statistic that suggests we are in the midst of a national crisis that almost no one knows about...The document cites a 2001 study that suggests 85% of lesbian, gay and bisexual men and women experienced homophobic bullying at school. It goes on to say: "Another UK study found that more than 50% of LGB men and women who had been bullied at school contemplated self-harm or suicide, while 40% had made at least one attempt to self-harm. A further study found that more than 20% had attempted suicide."...If we are to prevent a significant percentage of our children being victimised, led into self-hatred, self-harm and suicide attempts, then teachers should be teaching that being homosexual is a perfectly reasonable thing to be." - Phil Beadle, via. The Guardian.

rejection.details: Please provide a more specific call to action in your title.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
